amendment.description: An amendment numbered 27 printed in House Report 118-142 to strike section 1639 and to prohibit the use of funds for the sustainment of the B83-1 bomb.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike section 1639 and to prohibit the use of funds for the sustainment of the B83-1 bomb.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 217 (Roll no. 298).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 217 (Roll no. 298).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
